casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: A.C-H. No. 423P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Richard Croutharmel, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Ferrell, Jami Carpenter. Michelle F. Lynch, Attorney at Law, for Hilbourn, Susan. Misty Jorgenson, Attorney at Law, for GAL.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th of December 2017 by Petitioner & Guardian Ad Litem in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
